testsuite.name: FlashcardsTest
testsuite.system-out: ?[1;31m Start test 1?[0m Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit) > add Enter the term for card > black Enter the definition for card > white The pair ("black":"white") has been added. Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit) > add Enter the term for card > black The card "black" already exists. Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit) > add Enter the term for card > red Enter the definition for card > white The definition "white" already exists. Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit) > ask How many times to ask? > 2 Print the definition of "black": > white Correct answer. Print the definition of "black": > green Wrong answer. The correct one is "white" Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit) > exit Bye bye! ?[1;31m Start test 2?[0m Input the action (add, remove, import, export, ask, exit) > add Enter the term for card > a brother of one's parent Enter the definition for card > uncle The pair ("a brother of one's parent":"uncle") has been added.
